member.name: M:Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfigurationCollection.Add(System.String,System.Action{Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfiguration})
member.summary: Adds a new bundle with given . Throws if there is already a bundle with the same name.
member.returns: Returns this object for chained calls.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfigurationCollection.TryAdd(System.String,System.Action{Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfiguration},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tries to add a new bundle with given . Returns false if it's already created before. is not called if it's already added before.
member.param: Overrides the bundle even if it does exists. This option is designed to be used only for development time where bundle configuration action may change.
member.returns: Returns true if added. Returns false if it's already added before.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfigurationCollection.Configure(System.String,System.Action{Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfiguration})
member.summary: Configures an existing bundle. This method also works for lazy bundles (those are created using razor tag helpers).
member.returns: Returns this object for chained calls.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfigurationCollection.ConfigureAll(System.Action{Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundleConfiguration})
member.summary: Configures all bundles. This method also works for lazy bundles (those are created using razor tag helpers).
member.returns: Returns this object for chained calls.

member.name: F:Volo.Abp.AspNetCore.Mvc.UI.Bundling.BundlingMode.Auto
member.summary: Automatically determine the mode. - Uses for development time. - Uses for other environments.
